metadata.synopsis: JLatino: Deals with Avatar Astarion in the sun, Dark Urge might kill themself, Avatar Karlach wrap-up, companion Karlach is missing, Emperor present with Illithid Player.Would be good to start on a nuetral shot of folks walking back from the end of the pier.EXITS:Terminus

17.speaker: Player
17.text: *The tension dissipates - your companions begin to relax. You feel the warmth of their relief, their joy, their peace in each other's company.*
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach steps away from the others, unnoticed while they share in each other's jubilation.

154.speaker: Player
154.text: *The tension dissipates - your companions begin to relax. You feel the warmth of their relief, their joy, their peace in each other's company.*
154.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach steps away from the others, unnoticed while they share in each other's jubilation.

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *The tension dissipates - your companions begin to relax. You feel the warmth of their relief, their joy, their peace in each other's company.*
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach steps away from the others, unnoticed while they share in each other's jubilation.

74.speaker: Narrator
74.text: *A new quiet settles. Without the blazing Hells inside you, you can finally rest. And listen for the new voice - the quieter voice - that sounds from within.*
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach steps away from the others, unnoticed while they share in each other's jubilation.

0.text: *And in your own heart, the restless, biting sadness that burns within you - threatening to break.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach steps away from the others, unnoticed while they share in each other's jubilation.

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *And in your own heart, the restless, biting sadness that burns within you - threatening to break.*
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach steps away from the others, unnoticed while they share in each other's jubilation.

115.speaker: Narrator
115.text: *You can make it 'til dawn. If you gather every bit of strength you have, you can survive the night. One last night to say goodbye. One last night to live.*
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach, alone, walks off to one side (wherever she needs to be for END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach.) InternalNodeContext: Go to: END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach

146.speaker: Narrator
146.text: *You can make it 'til dawn. If you gather every bit of strength you have, you can survive the night. One last night to say goodbye. One last night to live.*
146.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach, alone, walks off to one side (wherever she needs to be for END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach.) InternalNodeContext: Go to: END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach

143.text: *This is the end of the line - the threshold where the others cannot follow. And you have no choice but to walk it - alone.*
143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach, alone, walks off to one side (wherever she needs to be for END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach.) InternalNodeContext: Go to: END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach

59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach, alone, walks off to one side (wherever she needs to be for END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach.) InternalNodeContext: Go to: END_GameFinale_DeathOfKarlach

83.speaker: Narrator
83.text: *Your skin now itches insufferably, as if covered in biting ants. You look, but see nothing out of the ordinary. Until...*
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion looks at his hand, but sees nothing

110.text: *This is it. With the mind flayer's parasite dead, your time in the sun is over.*
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: While he's looking at it, Astarion's hand starts to smoke. He's being burned by the sun once again.

51.text: *This is it. With the mind flayer's parasite dead, your time in the sun is over.*
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: While he's looking at it, Astarion's hand starts to smoke. He's being burned by the sun once again.

91.text: *This is it. With the mind flayer's parasite dead, your time in the sun is over.*

140.speaker: Narrator
140.text: *This is it. With the mind flayer's parasite dead, your time in the sun is over.*

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Astarion. The light will burn you to a crisp if you don't get to shelter.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion runs to escape the sun.

152.speaker: Shadowheart
152.text: Astarion. The light will burn you to a crisp if you don't get to shelter.
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion runs to escape the sun.

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: Astarion. The light will burn you to a crisp if you don't get to shelter.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion runs to escape the sun.

155.text: *You flee, stumbling through blinding light, your skin intolerably hot.*
155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion runs to escape the sun.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *You flee, stumbling through blinding light, your skin intolerably hot.*
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion runs to escape the sun.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: *It's hard to say how you find shelter, but you manage it. Now all that's left to do is wait for the familiar embrace of night.*
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Astarion in the shade, panting, a little singed, relieved to have made it, fearful of the light.

88.text: *For all its terrors, you missed it. Baldur's Gate is not a bad place for a vampire to live, to flourish. And flourish you will.*

68.speaker: Narrator
68.text: *For all its terrors, you missed it. Baldur's Gate is not a bad place for a vampire to live, to flourish. And flourish you will.*

131.speaker: Shadowheart
131.text: Astarion - you're starting to crisp up! Get out of the sun!

7.speaker: Wyll
7.text: Shit. Astarion, you need to get out of the light.
7.context: NodeContext: urgent, he hasn't noticed that he's begun to burn

122.speaker: Gale
122.text: I think it might be time for you to find a shadier spot, my friend. If I'm not mistaken, you're beginning to burn...
122.context: NodeContext: urgent, he hasn't noticed that he's begun to burn

157.speaker: Halsin
157.text: Astarion - the sun is burning you. To shelter, quick!
157.context: NodeContext: urgent, he hasn't noticed that he's begun to burn

9.speaker: Jaheira
9.text: Astarion! Get out of the sun!
9.context: NodeContext: urgent, he hasn't noticed that he's begun to burn

35.speaker: Minsc
35.text: Hide, Astarion! I do not think you are going to tan!

21.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
21.text: What is that enticing aroma? Ah - I do believe the sun is cooking poor Astarion.

149.text: Oh no - Astarion, you're burning up. Take cover, quickly!

134.speaker: Karlach
134.text: Oh no - Astarion, you're burning up. Take cover, quickly!

101.speaker: Player
101.text: *Your thoughts wander from your companions and everything you endured to your own piteous fate.*
101.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

48.text: *Your thoughts wander from your companions and everything you endured to your own piteous fate.*
48.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *Your thoughts wander from your companions and everything you endured to your own piteous fate.*
29.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *If only you'd defied your Father when you had the chance, and freed yourself of your dark desires... but it's too late now.*
6.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *Your destiny is set. Your very blood shall clot with the Urge, and that hungry desire will consume you.*
31.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

138.speaker: Narrator
138.text: *Your destiny is set. Your very blood shall clot with the Urge, and that hungry desire will consume you.*

127.speaker: Narrator
127.text: *You disobeyed the Lord of Murder. But his hold on you remains... It gnaws... You are hungry.*
127.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

62.text: *You may have freed the world from the control of the Netherbrain, but you are not yet free.*
62.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

114.speaker: Narrator
114.text: *You may have freed the world from the control of the Netherbrain, but you are not yet free.*
114.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

123.speaker: Narrator
123.text: *Your Father is angry. What foul punishment awaits you now that you have rejected him?*
123.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

89.speaker: Player
89.text: You are strong. You defeated a Netherbrain. Surely you can defeat the Lord of Murder?
89.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Whatever it is, you deserve it.
76.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

61.text: *And just like that, it's over. Whatever's left of you is subsumed by the overwhelming strength of your desires.*

79.speaker: Narrator
79.text: *And just like that, it's over. Whatever's left of you is subsumed by the overwhelming strength of your desires.*

37.speaker: Player
37.text: You must be contained. You will go to prison, and ask for the strongest handcuffs they have.
37.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

65.text: *Even now, your desires threaten to consume you. Your only hope is that a prison will be sufficient to contain you while you spend the rest of your life pondering your sins.*

96.speaker: Narrator
96.text: *Even now, your desires threaten to consume you. Your only hope is that a prison will be sufficient to contain you while you spend the rest of your life pondering your sins.*

67.text: *But it seems your Father has other ideas.*

137.speaker: Narrator
137.text: *But it seems your Father has other ideas.*

14.speaker: Player
14.text: This cannot be allowed to happen. One final act of resistance - kill yourself.
14.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

66.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

111.speaker: Player
111.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

90.speaker: Halsin
90.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

69.speaker: Karlach
69.text: Stop this right now. You have a life ahead of you - don't waste it!

100.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

141.text: *You've butchered so many before - each death a gift to your Father. But this one, you will take from him. This one is just for you.*
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge looks at the knife in contemplation. Stabs themselves multiple times (reuse if possible) once the narrator's line is done.

19.speaker: Narrator
19.text: *You've butchered so many before - each death a gift to your Father. But this one, you will take from him. This one is just for you.*
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge looks at the knife in contemplation. Stabs themselves multiple times (reuse if possible) once the narrator's line is done.

119.speaker: Narrator
119.text: *You've butchered so many before - each death a gift to your Father. But this one, you will take from him. This one is just for you.*
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge looks at the knife in contemplation. Stabs themselves multiple times (reuse if possible) once the narrator's line is done.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *The blade feels cool as it pierces your flesh. There is no pain, only the need to sleep... sleep... sleep...*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player commits suicide. Same as Lae'zel suicide in node UUID 018f0315-9257-01ee-4186-465f40352502.

145.speaker: Astarion
145.text: What do you think you're doing?
145.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] alarmed that player mind flayer is killing themselves

86.speaker: Astarion
86.text: What are you doing?! Stop it!
86.context: NodeContext: [Good(er) Path Astarion] alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

46.speaker: Wyll
46.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

4.speaker: Gale
4.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

45.speaker: Jaheira
45.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

118.speaker: Minsc
118.context: NodeContext: alarmed that the player mind flayer is killing themselves

92.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
92.text: It is as it should be. I hope you find peace.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: You are depravity compounded on depravity. You cannot be allowed to live. Take your own life.

55.speaker: The Emperor
55.text: Their concerns are so trifling, are they not?
55.context: NodeContext: conspirational, just to player, telepathic

84.speaker: The Emperor
84.text: Look at you. You're glorious. The greatest ally I could have wished for.
84.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

147.speaker: The Emperor
147.text: You know, this partnership doesn't have to end here... you and I could do wonderful things...
147.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

40.speaker: The Emperor
40.text: We could rebuild the Knights of the Shield and run it together. What do you say?
40.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

139.speaker: Player
139.text: You go ahead. I want to do some good in the world.
139.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

144.speaker: The Emperor
144.text: If you change your mind... you know where to find me.
144.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

20.speaker: Player
20.text: That sounds like a fine plan.
20.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

78.speaker: The Emperor
78.text: To business, then. We have much to discuss...
78.context: NodeContext: telepathic between Emperor and player

26.speaker: Player
26.text: We're mind flayers. We need to think bigger.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black on Emperor. Sounds of munching and brain-eating.

43.text: *It's hard to say what your companions make of you now; their faces betray only confusion. Though one face is notably missing - Karlach.*

73.speaker: Narrator
73.text: *It's hard to say what your companions make of you now; their faces betray only confusion. Though one face is notably missing - Karlach.*

38.speaker: The Emperor
38.text: Have I ever told you how much I enjoy you? Lead the way...

58.speaker: Player
58.text: There's only room for one mind flayer here. Eat its brain.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black on Emperor. Sounds of munching and brain-eating.

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *Chewy, cerebral, and delicious. Never in your life have you tasted something so delightful.*
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black on Emperor. Sounds of munching and brain-eating.

142.speaker: Narrator
142.text: *It's not as if you're doing anything wrong. Just following nature's plan.*

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I'm - not sure. She's been through quite the ordeal. Perhaps she's in camp...

36.text: I'm - not sure. She's been through quite the ordeal. Perhaps she's in camp...

13.speaker: Player
13.text: I'm - not sure. She's been through quite the ordeal. Perhaps she's in camp...

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: I'm - not sure. She's been through quite the ordeal. Perhaps she's in camp...

107.speaker: Astarion
107.text: Perhaps she's retired to camp? She has had a long day.

25.speaker: Wyll
25.text: Camp, would be my guess. She - she doesn't have much time left.
25.context: NodeContext: Wearily - referring to the fact that Karlach turned herself into a mind flayer to save us all

54.speaker: Jaheira
54.text: She's wandered off... Perhaps she just needs some time alone.
54.context: NodeContext: Wearily - referring to the fact that Karlach turned herself into a mind flayer to save us all

135.speaker: Shadowheart
135.text: She's wandered off... Perhaps she just needs some time alone.

104.speaker: Gale
104.text: No doubt she needs a moment alone with her thoughts. Who wouldn't, after all she's been through?

72.speaker: Halsin
72.text: Our mind flayer acquaintance has wandered off. Not feeling quite herself, perhaps... Understandable.

132.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
132.text: She has already lost her body to the tadpole... I hope she has not lost her mind. We should find her.

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *Her day has proven longer than most, but it's not over yet.*

8.speaker: Jaheira
8.text: Perhaps she has returned to camp. She has... much to think on.
8.context: NodeContext: Wearily - referring to the fact that Karlach turned herself into a mind flayer to save us all

82.speaker: Minsc
82.text: To camp, says Boo! She may have slipped into a new skin, but her scent still singes my hamster's nose.
82.context: NodeContext: Trying to be enthusiastic - referring to the fact that Karlach has turned into a mind flayer to save us all

124.speaker: Player
124.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

99.speaker: Wyll
99.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

105.speaker: Lae'zel
105.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

93.speaker: Player
93.text: She returned to camp to rest - and to consider her fate. I fear Karlach is not long for this world.
93.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

109.speaker: Lae'zel
109.text: She returned to camp to rest - and to consider her fate. I fear Karlach is not long for this world.
109.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

117.speaker: Shadowheart
117.text: She said she needed some time to herself, and she'd meet us at camp. I'm not sure she's going to last much longer...
117.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

156.speaker: Astarion
156.text: She must be at camp. I think she was getting a little too hot under the collar.
156.context: NodeContext: [Arrogant Astarion] Comment on Karlach's overheating engine that's threatening to kill her

30.speaker: Wyll
30.text: She's at camp, waiting for us. I - I don't think she'll be able to hang on much longer.
30.context: NodeContext: Talking about a companion who's about the

71.speaker: Halsin
71.text: I fear her time is running short...
71.context: NodeContext: Talking about a companion who's about the

98.speaker: Jaheira
98.text: She's taking the long route back to camp. Her time with us is running short - no doubt she's many thoughts to get in order.
98.context: NodeContext: Talking about a companion who's about the

64.speaker: Gale
64.text: She's taking the long route back to camp. Her time with us is running short - no doubt she's many thoughts to get in order.
64.context: NodeContext: Talking about a companion who's about the

103.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
103.text: She is measuring out the last moments of her life. We should find her, and say our goodbyes.
103.context: NodeContext: sad, contemplative. Speaking o fKarlach, who is dying.

121.speaker: Narrator
121.text: *Her time is running short, and so too is your window to say goodbye.*

94.speaker: Jaheira
94.text: Back to camp. She will not have much time.
94.context: NodeContext: sudden urgency, realising Karlach has returned to camp to die

23.speaker: Minsc
23.text: We must find her, before it is too late - to camp, quickly!
23.context: NodeContext: sudden urgency, realising Karlach has returned to camp to die

148.speaker: Astarion
148.text: Hold on - we're a body short. Where's Karlach?

129.speaker: Jaheira
129.text: Hold a moment - where is Karlach?

87.speaker: Wyll
87.context: NodeContext: All the drama done, he turns to other matters as if simply moving on. Asking Karlach if Boo can heat himself on her furnace, before realizing she's not there

3.speaker: Gale
3.text: We're short a tiefling - where is Karlach?
3.context: NodeContext: All the drama done, he turns to other matters as if simply moving on. Asking Karlach if Boo can heat himself on her furnace, before realizing she's not there

49.speaker: Halsin
49.text: What of Karlach? I cannot lay eyes on her...
49.context: NodeContext: All the drama done, he turns to other matters as if simply moving on. Asking Karlach if Boo can heat himself on her furnace, before realizing she's not there

57.speaker: Minsc
57.text: Now, Karlach - Boo still shivers from the sea. May he toast himself against your... Karlach? Where has she gone?
57.context: NodeContext: All the drama done, he turns to other matters as if simply moving on. Asking Karlach if Boo can heat himself on her furnace, before realizing she's not there

33.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
33.text: Hold - this gathering has become altogether too civilised. Where is Karlach?
